parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: Whether to request that the database size be exact instead of approximate

200.description: The size (in triples) of the database

get.summary: Return an RDF serialization of the data in the database

parameters.name: obf
parameters.description: Path to an obfuscation configuration file, or DEFAULT

application/rdf+xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rdf:RDF
	xmlns="http://api.stardog.com/"
	xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
	xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#"
	xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
	xmlns:stardog="tag:stardog:api:"
	xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#">

<rdf:Description rdf:about="urn:example:Entity1">
	<rdf:type rdf:resource="urn:example:Entity"/>
	<hasProp xmlns="urn:example:" rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer">42</hasProp>
</rdf:Description>

</rdf:RDF>

post.summary: Return an obfuscated RDF serialization of the data in the database

200.description: Obfuscated RDF serialization of the database
